newsitem.title: HONG KONG: China EB Tech seeks investment in China.
newsitem.headline: China EB Tech seeks investment in China.

text.p: Television sets and audio products maker China Everbright Technology Ltd said on Tuesday it was exploring investment opportunities in China, but did not specify if it was focussing on telecommunications.

"The company is actively exploring certain investment opportunities in the PRC (People's Republic of China) which may or may not include telecommunications industry in the PRC," the company's vice chairman Tong Xin said in a statement on Tuesday.
"However, no binding agreements have been reached or finalized in relation to any specific investment or acquisition at this stage," Tong added.
The company's shares jumped HK$0.08 or 47.90 percent to HK$0.247 on Monday on rumours that its parent might inject China mobile phone projects into the company.
Its shares rose a further HK$0.018 or 7.29 percent to HK$0.265 at midday Tuesday with 40.10 million shares changing hand.
